headline: Earnings Estimates Rising for AppLovin (APP): Will It Gain?
summary: AppLovin (APP) shares have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term, as indicated by solid earnings estimate revisions.

headline: APP Q2 Deep Dive: Platform Expansion and Self-Service Strategy Drive Future Growth
summary: Mobile app advertising platform AppLovin (NASDAQ: APP) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q2 CY2025, but sales rose 16.5% year on year to $1.26 billion. On the other hand, next quarter’s outlook exceeded expectations with revenue guided to $1.33 billion at the midpoint, or 1.3% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.49 per share was 7.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
